pageTitle: Itinerary for Sunday, August 12, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Fredericton, New Brunswick

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Fredericton Police Force members and their families.

Closed to media.

4:40 p.m. The Prime Minister will lay flowers outside the Fredericton Police Force.

Fredericton Police Force
311 Queen Street

Note for media:

    • Open coverage

6:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a Fredericton Pride social event.

The Snooty Fox
68 Regent Street

Note for media:

    • Pooled photo opportunity
